attributes.action: Allow choice of religion for British monarch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition that statute changes be made to allow any British monarch the right to select their personal religion.
Currently a monarch must be a Christian of the denomination; Church of England.
It is considered to be morally wrong that a person cannot choose their religion.
It is further argued that in a country with such a wide ethnic and religiously mixed population the insistence that its monarch must be a Christian, or have any religion, is immoral, and potentially dangerous.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
